<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Health check handler (legacy `GET /health`)."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/health"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the current service health status including:
- Status (healthy, degraded, unhealthy)
- Application version
- Uptime in seconds
- Database connectivity
- Current timestamp

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

>
  
</RequestSchema>

</StatusCodes>
